text: This will work. Just note that you can’t proxy from Cloudflare to HubSpot because Cloudflare doesn’t support proxying to itself.
<@U22PJPGK0> Can you clarify that? In practical terms what will that affect? Will <https://www> redirect to https:// without the security warning? I apologize for my ignorance.
redirects work fine. You just can’t proxy (no redirect in the browser)

Right, multi-language pages have been around since 2016, but the drop-down language selector in the Settings of the editor was rolled out in February.

<@U25PYL3Q8>  it sounds like you’re trying to get rid of an extra language option that’s appearing in your site’s language menu (en-uk?), is that right?
yeah <@UGY22E2KC> -- we unpublished the pages and they still show up
I have it hidden with js/css because we unpublished them all, but its only a temporary work around

Hm… I haven’t been able to reproduce that (unpublishing a page in one language (the only page of that language) and seeing that language stick around in the language picker). I did notice that it took a couple of minutes to update and I had to clear my cache, but I’m betting you probably already checked that stuff :slightly_smiling_face:

Correct me if I’m wrong, but it seems like there are two topics here, and it looks like the support chat was about one and not the other:
1. The problem you’re seeing is English - United Kingdom is an option in your langauge picker even though you’ve unpublished all `en-gb` pages. 
2. You can’t un-set a language in the Settings of a page once a language has been set.
Looks like the chat with Justine was about the language selector in Settings, but sounds like the real problem is the language picker holding onto `en-gb` as an option. Is that correct?
It appears to have resolved itself from yesterday to today <@UGY22E2KC>

"Looks like the chat with Justine was about the language selector in Settings, but sounds like the real problem is the language picker holding onto `en-gb` as an option. Is that correct?" as far as that statement goes, I was asking how to get it to not show up after unpublishing. I don't know anything about settings or where the language settings are. This is my first time using this stuff on HubSpot . (multi lingual)
